description: A fully object-oriented .Net wrapper for the TrelloAPI.
releaseNotes:
Please be sure to read the wiki pages at https://bitbucket.org/gregsdennis/manatee.trello/wiki/Home.

See Trello board for this project at https://trello.com/b/BVlClkAR/.  Feedback and questions are welcome through the board, on StackOverflow, or by emailing littlecrabsolutions@yahoo.com.

v1.3.0
Added optional custom authentication for individual entities.

v1.2.2
BUG FIX: Actions not populating data when loaded from collection.

v.1.2.1.1
Repackaged.

v1.2.1
Label implementation revamped to incorporate changes by Trello.
- Added new colors
- ReadOnlyLabel replaced by Label
- Updated Card.Labels.Add() & Card.Labels.Remove()
- Board.LabelNames replaced by Board.Labels (includes an Add() method)
- Labels can now be explicitly deleted.
Updated Card.List assignment to automatically detect when the list is on a different board.
Minor bug fixes.

v1.2.0
Added configuration option to all processor thread to keep application alive.
Added search parameter construction.
Added limit parameter to Search.
Added Member.Mention.
Converted enumeration properties to nullable to support more accurate data transfer.
BUG FIX: BoardPreferences not submitting any data.
BUG FIX: Search produces an InvalidCastException.
BUG FIX: Pending changes should be canceled upon calling Delete().
title: Manatee.Trello
